item.title: The Calm Before the Storm
item.description: Today we deliver another gathering of news from across the lands and across the ethereal worlds of the net. We look at some new changes to test, some discussions of new LDON raids, and the continuing class issue updates.

item.title: The New Mobhunter
item.description: This week we release a new version of Mobhunter for our faithful readers to poke with sharp pointy sticks. Come take a look!

item.title: Swapping, Selling, and Soloing
item.description: This week we take a look at the most recent patch, some updates to the test server, and some interesting discussions happening around the community. Oh yes, we also overthrow the aristocracy of the uberguild and give power to the people...oh wait, thats next week.

item.title: The Advantages of Point-based Loot
item.description: This week's Mobhunter discusses the advantages of a point-based loot system. While Everquest primarily uses random drops to reward players with equipment, Lost Dungeons of Norrath showed us a new, fair, and powerful loot system. It is my hope that we see systems like this used more in the future.

item.title: Summit Changes Round 2
item.description: An upcoming patch this week includes many new changes and improvements for the live servers. This week's article discusses changes to the tribute system, safe augment removal, LDON adventure point refunds, two new LDON raiding zones, the Veeshan's Peak revamp, and a few other changes.

item.title: Progression in Everquest
item.description: In this week's editorial we look at how progression works in Everquest. We discuss what progression is, where it runs free, where it gets blocked up, where it is strong, and where it needs to improve.

item.title: The Book of Gunthak
item.description: Today's article covers this week's patch including the new Gunthak stone, changes to Time, updates for the PvP servers, strange new slash commands, and a few other updates.

item.title: Return to the Sewers
item.description: This week's news roundup discusses the new Gunthak portal, Time changes, high-cost LDON gear, a new raid instance, augment swapping, LDON item refunds, and Loral's latest sewer disaster. We at Mobhunter get killed by gnats so you don't have to!

item.title: The Guild Summit Report
item.description: This weekend's guild summit revealed a lot of history and a lot of the future of Everquest. Read Loral's report on the state of the game.

item.title: Loral's Evil Agenda
item.description: Next week SOE is hosting a visit for guild leaders and community representatives to talk about the state of the Everquest and get feedback. This article outlines the evil agenda I plan to bring to San Diego and hand to the Everquest developers.

item.title: Caves of the Kobold Slavers
item.description: A new patch today brought us a new tutorial, some fixes to the Plane of Knowledge crashes, and some other stuff. We also look at the Gates revamp and Sony's new pricing plans.

item.title: Something New
item.description:
As our faithful readers already know, change is slow to come here at Mobhunter. The look, the functionality, and the Planes of Power ad have all been constants you've been able to count on for years. But it's time that we add something new.
Read on to discover our latest addition...

item.title: Whispers of War
item.description: We received a lot of big news last week. Today we discuss the Omens of War and the Gates of Discord retune. Enjoy!

item.title: The End May Be Nigh Someday!
item.description: Today we discuss Everquest 2's beta registration, this week's patch and its results, the death of Afterlife, and a special report on Gates of Discord retuning.

item.title: Found: More Lost Dungeons
item.description: Patch day today. We look at some of the new features of the patch including new LDON zones, the free Plane of Knowledge, the new "Hot Spots", and cover a few bits of news from last week.
